name: Anti-Hexagon
description:
THIS IS AN ALPHA VERSION

This game need extra work (quite a lot), but it's playable ! So I want to know if it's a good start or not.
If you want to report bugs, say something that can improve this game, don't hesitate to comment on this page, I'll take notes ;)

Yes, this game is a hard one, but some speed modifications will be done soon ^^

DESCRIPTION

Anti-Hexagon is an hommage to Super-Hexagon (and yes. this is actually an octogone in my game. i know. thank you. i have to change game's name), where your goal is to score until you reach the best score. Shoot the tiles to gain points, and chain them until you get a bigger multiplier. Listen to the music, and be in sync with it if you want to win.

MODES :

There is slight changes between the 3 modes this game propose :

  • The mode 1 is the mode that I think is the best. There is a little transition between patterns, and those patterns can appear with predefined positions (what I call the offset)
  • The mode 2 disable transition
  • The mode 3 disable the offset

Tell me which one is the best ;)

COMMANDS :

  • Joystick (or arrow keys) to aim
  • Press button A on the XBox controller (or G on the keyboard) to shoot

This is my first real project (I've done gamejams until now), so I hope you'll like it <3

CREDITS :

Music : Armand 🦝 https://armand36.itch.io/
Everything else (but the sound design) : Arcadeuh https://arcadeuh.itch.io/

WARNING :

This game is not suited for people with epilepsy
